item.title: Gnome Humour!
item.description: Geeks always face a hard time finding girl friends. If fortunately, a geek has a girl friend, they are sure that they will find bug in their relationship and needs a Bugzilla to fix it. Here is one, read onâ€¦ Dear Gnome, Please, have some empathy and help me out. Because of you, my boyfriend is chronically attached to his computer and has ceased to pay attention to me.
